name: Mission Critical

write_file.content:
[sdl]
sensitivity=20
[autoexec]
mount D "$GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC" -t cdrom
mount C "$GAMEDIR/HDD" -t dir
D:
install
exit

[sdl]
sensitivity=20
[autoexec]
mount D "$GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC"  -t cdrom
mount C "$GAMEDIR/HDD" -t dir
C:
cd mission
mission
exit

content:
game:
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/mission-critical.conf
installer:
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/bash

      src=$1

      dst=$2

      cp -avr "$src/."  "$dst"'
    file: $CACHE/bulkcopy.sh
- chmodx: $CACHE/bulkcopy.sh
- execute:
    args: $GAMEDIR/HDD $GAMEDIR/CDD  $GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC
    file: mkdir
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc 1
    requires: MISSION
- execute:
    args: $DISC $GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC
    file: $CACHE/bulkcopy.sh
- execute:
    args: -R 775  "$GAMEDIR"
    file: /bin/chmod
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc 2
    requires: MISSION
- execute:
    args: $DISC $GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC
    file: $CACHE/bulkcopy.sh
- execute:
    args: -R 775  "$GAMEDIR"
    file: /bin/chmod
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc 3
    requires: MISSION
- execute:
    args: $DISC $GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC
    file: $CACHE/bulkcopy.sh
- execute:
    args: -R 775  "$GAMEDIR"
    file: /bin/chmod
- write_file:
    content: '[sdl]

      sensitivity=20

      [autoexec]

      mount D "$GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC" -t cdrom

      mount C "$GAMEDIR/HDD" -t dir

      D:

      install

      exit'
    file: $GAMEDIR/mission-critical-setup.conf
- task:
    config_file: $GAMEDIR/mission-critical-setup.conf
    name: dosexec
    working_dir: $GAMEDIR/HDD/
- write_file:
    content: '[sdl]

      sensitivity=20

      [autoexec]

      mount D "$GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC"  -t cdrom

      mount C "$GAMEDIR/HDD" -t dir

      C:

      cd mission

      mission

      exit'
    file: $GAMEDIR/mission-critical.conf
